title: LF main SUPPORT

embed.description: Create & discover new Champion builds/strategies, check your Summoner statistics and try our powerful LoL charts.

body:
hello guys im looking for a nice  main supp most be active everyday i play in the  eastern time  
im silver 2 about to get gold 

u must be silver and up i will take a bronze but will do a test first all i want is a nice supp 

add me ....


kurama13    ..

replies.body:
Sup Main, not a smurf but add me if you at least want to try out a couple games. Always willing to learn as well.

na.op.gg/summoner/userName=9tt2
